keyPolicies.policyTitle: A good Brexit deal for Plymouth
keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will fight for a deal to secure our jobs and rights and to protect our environment, fishermen and exporters.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Stand up for our armed forces
keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will always support our Royal Navy and Royal Marines, back Trident, fight defence cuts and support our veterans.
I will call for properly funded schools. I want teachers to have the resources to help Plymouth’s children succeed.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Protect our hospitals and the NHS
keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will oppose Tory cuts and NHS privatisation. We need to invest in our NHS and train more doctors and nurses.
I will stand up for Plymouth’s pensioners against the ‘Dementia Tax’ and plans to scrap Winter Fuel Allowance and the Triple Lock.
I will put Plymouth before party each and every time. It is time we had an MP who always puts Plymouth first.

I will always support our Royal Navy and Royal Marines, back Trident, fight defence cuts and support our veterans.
